name: Island Paradise
description:
Size:	40” x 56” 

A combination of dots, leafy-prints and irregular stripes in cool blues, greens and citrus suggest palm trees swaying in the breeze as the waves of the ocean reach the shore. Backed in irregular stripes and bound in blue with green polka dots, this quilt would be a pleasure to snuggle with in your own personal retreat. 

Island Paradise was machine pieced and machine quilted in white with a freehand meandering pattern. The binding is a traditional double fold binding. The fabrics and batting are both made from 100% cotton. It has been gently washed in cold water and tumble-dried on low to achieve a soft, crinkled old-fashioned look.

For maximum longevity, please wash your quilt with a mild detergent in cold water on the gentle cycle and tumble dry on a low heat setting.


NOTE: To ensure your product arrives in the condition it was sent, all orders will be shipped via UPS.
